msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your it's a custom-designed DIY piece, yes? I thought it looked different from the one I have at home, and now I see why. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's so YOU to create such a bold and original piece, . I confess, I'm a wee bit jealous!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your looks so different from the one in my house. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's remarkable the way the same piece can change with one little tweak to its arrangement. Bravo, ! You've done it again!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! Why, I have the very same piece at my house. In fact, they're identical right down to the pattern!<20_3 arg="10" /><20_3 arg="3" /> I always knew we two had superb taste, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your I see now it's a custom design, no? I thought it was different from mine. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm impressed. You've transformed an utterly standard piece into something unique. Bravo, darling!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Why, just look at your lovely ! I have the very same one at home, myself. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />We're interior-design twinsies! Perhaps we have more in common than we thought, .
